```{r}
show_col(pal_uchicago("default")(9))
col_vec <- c(pal_uchicago("default")(9)[1],pal_uchicago("default")(9)[3],pal_uchicago("default")(9)[5])
```


#Load Data
```{r}
e <- readRDS("../Data/automated_soma.rds")
```

```{r}
ag <- aggregate(e$ratio,e[,c("Diff","sample","image")], FUN=median)
```



#statistics
```{r}
mod_s1 <- lm(x ~ sample + Diff,ag)
summary(mod_s1)
s1 <- emmeans(mod_s1, trt.vs.ctrl ~ sample , ref="pLNA-Ctrl")
s1


s1_df <- as.data.frame(s1$contrasts)
s1_df$group1 <- "pLNA-Ctrl"
s1_df$group2 <- s1_df$contrast
s1_df$group2 <- gsub("\\ - \\(pLNA-Ctrl\\)","",s1_df$group2)
s1_df$group2 <- gsub("\\(", "",s1_df$group2)
s1_df$group2 <- gsub("\\)", "",s1_df$group2)
s1_df <- add_significance(s1_df,p.col = "p.value")
s1_df$p.value.signif <- round(s1_df$p.value,3)

#add y_position
y_pos <- c()
for(i in s1_df$group2) {
  ll <- max(ag[ag$sample == i,"x"])
  y_pos <- c(y_pos,ll)
}

s1_df$y_pos <- y_pos*1.2
```


```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(ag,aes(x = sample, y = x)) +
  geom_violin(show.legend = FALSE) +
  stat_summary(
    fun = mean,
    geom="crossbar",
    show.legend = FALSE
  ) +
  stat_summary(aes(color = Diff),
    show.legend = TRUE,
    fun = mean,
    fun.max = function(x) {mean(x) + sd(x)},
    fun.min = function(x) {mean(x) - sd(x)},
    geom="pointrange", position=position_dodge(width=0.35), size = 0.75
  ) +
  ggsignif::geom_signif(
    data = s1_df,
    aes(xmin = group1, xmax = group2, annotations = p.value.signif, y_position = y_pos),
    textsize = 4, vjust = -0.1, size = 0.75, manual = TRUE
  ) +
  ylab("Ratio of acidid mitochondria in soma\n(ac / (ac + ne) - Median per image") +
  theme_classic(base_size = 12)+
  scale_color_manual(values = col_vec) +
  theme(strip.text.x = element_text(size = rel(1.1)),
        strip.placement = "inside",
        text = element_text(size = 14),
        axis.title.x=element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size = rel(1)))

ggsave2("../../FigureOutput/AutoSeqment_Soma_Ratio.png",p1, width = 7,height = 5, bg = "white")
```
